1533230.name: RPG Maker MZ - Medieval Fantasy Weapons Pack
1533230.description:
Load up your armoury and prepare for battle with this fantastic new weapons pack! Containing all the necessary go-to fantasy battle weapons, from swords and axes, to magical wands and staves! Everything you'll need for your medieval fantasy wars!

Features

* 144 weapons included.
* 10 weapon types: Short Swords, Greatswords, Staves, Magical Wands, Axes, Spears, Small Blades, Bows, Flais and Scepters.
* Each Weapon type has 12 designs (plus 12 extra Magic Wands, and 12 extra Staves)
* Magical, Creature, "Buff and Debuff", Legendary, Elemental designs included!
* Sheet format by weapon type included (576 x 384 the default file size, a file with 12 weapons, 12 files in total)
* Single file versions included (288 x 64 to use with custom plugins, a file with a single weapon, 144 files in total)
* Iconset included! (In the same format/design as the default RPG Maker MZ iconset)

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1533230.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
